title: Strategic insights for sustainable growth of mushroom farming industry in Bangladesh: A comprehensive evaluation using SWOT-AHP and TOPSIS frameworks
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Biplob Dey, Md Ahosan Habib Ador, Mohammed Masum Ul Haque, Jannatul Ferdous, Md Abdul Halim, Mohammad Belal Uddin, Romel Ahmed
